lore: Every Vortex is powered by pure magic and needs to consume at least one Spell Gem every three days to keep its structure intact.\n\nSulfuric Vortices are made up of a corrosive magical substance that produces first-degree burns in just a moment of contact with the skin. This property gets stronger the smaller they are, and they can easily pierce their enemies' bodies at high speed when they are at their smallest size.
menagerieDialog: (It whirls around in circles, emitting a powerful light.)
(It whirs around the menagerie, annoying your other creatures who are trying to rest.)
(This creature's presence is particularly welcome in the stuffy confines of these castle walls.)
(It's starting to lose its luster - it might be time to feed it another Spell Gem.)
(This creature is surprisingly small when it's not wreaking havoc with its winds.)
name: Sulfuric Vortex
